# P&M Plastics

> Custom plastic fabrication and manufacturing on the Gold Coast, Australia. 30 years of experience in CNC cutting, laser engraving, vacuum forming, thermo forming, and more. From concept to creation — no job too big or small.

P&M Plastics is a full-service plastic fabrication workshop based in Burleigh Heads, QLD. We handle everything from design consultation and material recommendation through to precision CNC manufacturing and delivery. We stock one of the largest ranges of plastic materials on the Gold Coast.

## Services

- [CNC Water Jet Cutting](https://www.pmplastics.com.au/#services): Precision cutting of virtually any material up to 150mm thick
- [CNC Vacuum Forming](https://www.pmplastics.com.au/#services): Custom moulds and formed plastic components
- [CNC Router Cutting](https://www.pmplastics.com.au/#services): Complex shapes and profiles in any plastic
- [CNC Laser Cutting](https://www.pmplastics.com.au/#services): Fine detail cutting with sub-millimetre accuracy
- [Plastic Thermo Forming](https://www.pmplastics.com.au/#services): Heat-formed plastic for custom shapes
- [2D & 3D Laser Engraving](https://www.pmplastics.com.au/#services): Detailed engraving and etching on any surface

## Materials

We stock: Perspex, Lexan Polycarbonate, Acrylic (sheets, tubes, rods), Euro-Mir Acrylic Mirrors, PVC, HDPE, PTFE, Nylon, Polypropylene, UHMWPE, Corflute, Plaspanel, ABS, HIPS, PETG, and engineering plastics.

- [Buy Materials Online](https://perspexonline.com.au): Cut-to-size plastic sheets via Perspex Online

## Contact

- Phone: 07 5535 7544

- Hours: Mon–Fri 7:30am–4:00pm
